document.full_text: most americans believe democratic reforms in the middle east would be positive for the united states but are divided over whether unrest sweeping the region will lead to greater democracy, according to a survey released on monday.
document.title: americans say mideast democratic reform good for u.s.
lines_and_colors: most americans believe democratic reforms in the middle east would be positive for the united states but are divided over whether unrest sweeping the region will lead to greater democracy, according to a survey released on monday.
